directions: In a mixing bowl, combine the apple, orange, grapes and nectarine. If using a passion fruit, spoon out the flesh and chop.
Pour enough fresh juice to coat and prevent oxidation. Toss and refrigerate.
Serve with dollop of low-fat yogurt.
ingredients: 1 large orange, peeled, sectioned, and cut into bite-size
title: Chloe's Quick Fruit Salad
